item.title: 数字欧元让德国人担心他们的钱不安全
item.description: 在距离法兰克福约 100 公里（62 英里）的一个风景如画的葡萄酒小镇上，有一个隐藏的地堡，几十年来一直是德国最隐秘的秘密之一。这座建于 1962 年的洞穴式建筑存放着替代德国马克，以防西德的冷战敌人用伪钞充斥市场，引发恶性通货膨胀。【原文：In a picturesque wine town about 100 kilometers (62 miles) from Frankfurt lies a hidden bunker that for decades was one of Germany’s best-kept secrets. Built in 1962, the cavernous structure housed alternative deutsche marks, should West Germany’s Cold War foes flood the market with counterfeit banknotes in a bid to trigger hyperinflation.】

item.title: 爱立信达成 10 亿美元交易，将美国公司出售给科氏集团
item.description: 瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信公司（Ericsson AB）达成一项价值 10 亿美元的交易，将其美国呼叫路由业务 Iconectiv 出售给科氏工业公司（Koch Industries Inc.【原文：Swedish telecom-equipment maker Ericsson AB reached a $1 billion deal to sell its US call-routing business Iconectiv to a private investment arm of Koch Industries Inc.】

item.title: 亚洲公用事业股二十年来从未如此顺风顺水
item.description: 公用事业类股票已成为亚洲投资者不太可能青睐的股票，而且越来越多的人认为，它们今年的出色涨势还有很长的路要走。【原文：Utilities stocks have emerged as an unlikely favorite of investors in Asia, and bets are growing that their standout rally this year has further to go.】

item.title: 因盈利增长，S&P 将 Uber 的评级上调至投资级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司周五将优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：S&P Global Ratings upgraded Uber Technologies Inc.’s credit ratings to investment-grade status on Friday, citing the ride-hailing and food-delivery company’s consistent earnings growth.】

item.title: 阿姆洛争取到 8.52 亿美元养老基金支持伊贝尔德罗拉公司交易
item.description: 大多数墨西哥养老基金同意参与 8.52 亿美元的配售，以帮助安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔总统的政府为购买 Iberdrola SA 资产提供资金。【原文：A majority of Mexican pension funds agreed to take part in a $852 million placement to help President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador’s administration finance the purchase of Iberdrola SA assets.】

item.title: 穆迪将爱尔兰财政状况展望上调至正面
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）对爱尔兰的信用评级给予积极展望，强调了财政实力持续改善的前景。【原文：Moody’s Investors Service put a positive outlook on Ireland’s credit rating, highlighting prospects of a sustained improvement in fiscal strength.】

item.title: 华尔街股灾让交易员了解脆弱的现代市场
item.description: 在华尔街，贪婪战胜了恐惧；最近几周震撼全球的市场灾难很可能只是长期价格图表上的昙花一现。【原文：Greed has overcome fear on Wall Street — and the market cataclysm that shook up the world in recent weeks may well prove a mere blip on long-term price charts.】

item.title: 克罗格开始债务交换要约，考虑出售新债券
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger Co.）计划就可能的多部分债券销售向投资者征求意见，并已开始对收购目标阿尔伯森公司（Albertsons Cos.）发行的债务提出交换要约，因为反垄断审查对这一潜在的合作迫在眉睫。【原文：Kroger Co. plans to sound out investors for a possible multi-part bond sale and has begun an exchange offer for debt issued by takeover target Albertsons Cos., as antitrust scrutiny looms over the potential tie-up.】

item.title: 穆迪分析称美国写字楼市场出现触底迹象
item.description: 据穆迪分析公司（Moody's Analytics）称，随着销售量止跌回升，大型物业的转售价格远低于之前的交易价值，美国写字楼长达数年的价格下跌可能很快就会结束。【原文：A years-long price decline for US offices could soon be ending as sales volume has stopped falling and large properties are being resold well below prior deal values, according to Moody’s Analytics.】

item.title: 对冲基金在套利交易爆仓后转而看涨日元
item.description: 自 2021 年以来，对冲基金首次转而看涨日本货币，此前外汇市场的剧烈波动导致热门日元交易暴跌。【原文：Hedge funds turned bullish on Japan’s currency for the first time since 2021 after sharp swings in foreign-exchange markets led to a blow-up of a popular yen trade.】

item.title: 华尔街诞生一批新的波动性单日基金
item.description:
说到这些高能效 ETF，有很多问题值得讨论

。【原文：

There’s plenty to debate about when it comes to these high-octane ETFs

】

item.title: 花旗集团叫停债券市场流行的 "特朗普交易
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s strategists have abandoned a once-popular “Trump trade.”】

item.title: 黄金、比特币、英伟达......素食主义？为什么现在似乎什么都有 ETF？
item.description:
ETF的市场规模接近13万亿美元，而且还在不断增长。但是，ETF 究竟包含哪些内容？它们为何如此受欢迎？【原文：

The market for ETFs is nearly 13 trillion dollars – and growing. But just what goes into an ETF? And why did they get so popular?

】

item.title: 高盛对冲基金主管称风险缓解后应坚持质量至上
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Positioning and macro factors shift the market skew to positive, but investors should still focus on buying high-quality assets, according to Tony Pasquariello, global head of hedge funds coverage at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 大科技股 "全军覆没 "转为 "逢低买入"，股价大幅回升
item.description: 8 月 5 日，纳斯达克 100 指数在开盘后的几秒钟内暴跌超过 5%，似乎一场清算即将来临，验证了人们对科技泡沫即将破灭的担忧。【原文：It looked like a reckoning was arriving on August 5, when the Nasdaq 100 tumbled over 5% in the seconds after the opening bell, validating fears that a tech bubble was about to burst.】

item.title: 罕见的动物园债券加入市政债券销售大潮，为扩建提供资金
item.description: 今年夏天将是市政债券销售最繁忙的季节之一，投资者抢购了从机场项目、公共交通系统到学区的各种融资交易。本周，他们借出 4000 万美元，用于改造东海岸最大的动物园之一。【原文：In a summer that’s shaping up to be one of the busiest ever for municipal bond sales, investors have snapped up deals financing everything from airport projects and public transit systems to school districts. This week, they lent $40 million to spruce up one of largest zoos on the East Coast.】

item.title: 医疗保健顾问公司 Leerink 从 Evercore 聘请了两名银行家
item.description: 专门从事医疗保健交易的咨询公司 Leerink Partners 已从 Evercore Inc.【原文：Leerink Partners, an advisory firm specializing in health-care deals, has hired two investment bankers from Evercore Inc.】

item.title: 随着降息押注减弱，国债将在本周结束时震荡走高
item.description: 在受到经济数据的冲击后，本周国债将以强劲的走势收尾，交易员们一致押注美联储将在下个月降息四分之一个百分点。【原文：Treasuries were set to end the week on a strong note after being whipsawed by economic data, with traders coalescing around bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by a quarter-point next month.】

item.title: 加沙停火谈判继续进行，布林肯将访问以色列
item.description: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）将于本周末前往以色列，参加新一轮旨在阻止以色列-哈马斯战争的会谈。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Israel this weekend following a fresh round of talks to halt the Israel-Hamas war, as officials keep working to deter a threatened attack by Iran.】

item.title: 奇数通讯：我们将在杰克逊霍尔学到什么
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货》周刊，乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。特蕾西本周出刊。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and economy. Tracy is out this week.】

item.title: 加州计划发行 25 亿美元免税债券
item.description: 加利福尼亚州计划在本月晚些时候出售 25 亿美元的免税普通义务债券，这是该州今年发行的第二大债券。【原文：California is planning to sell $2.5 billion of tax-exempt general obligation bonds later this month, the state’s second largest offering this year.】

item.title: 投资者等待批准，Emergent 领涨与 Mpox 相关的股票
item.description: 本周，Emergent BioSolutions 公司引领了疫苗和抗病毒产品公司股票的上涨，因为投资者正在等待美国监管机构关于其天花疫苗是否也可用于快速传播的麻疹病毒的消息。【原文：Emergent BioSolutions Inc. led an advance in the stocks of companies working on vaccines and antiviral products this week as investors await word from US regulators on if its smallpox vaccine can also be used for the fast-spreading mpox virus.】

item.title: 耐克期待八年来最长连胜记录，情绪发生转变
item.description: 耐克公司的股价在 6 月底因销售预期疲软而受到重创，但在一系列利好消息的推动下，该公司股价目前有望创下八年多来最长的连胜纪录。【原文：Battered in late June after a weak sales forecast, Nike Inc. shares are now on track for their longest winning streak in more than eight years, propelled higher by a torrent of positive developments.】

item.title: 双线瞄准拉美新星，回避中国债务
item.description: 杰弗里-冈德拉克（Jeffrey Gundlach）的双线资本公司（DoubleLine Capital）的旗舰新兴市场债务基金正在大量购买危地马拉和巴拉圭的债券，同时放弃风险较高的信贷。【原文：The flagship emerging-market debt fund from Jeffrey Gundlach’s DoubleLine Capital is loading up on bonds from Guatemala and Paraguay as it ditches riskier credits.】

item.title: Maravai Lifesciences 收到收购要约后股价飙升
item.description: 马拉维生命科学控股公司（Maravai Lifesciences Holdings Inc.【原文：Maravai Lifesciences Holdings Inc. shares soared after a report that the company received a takeover offer from Repligen Corp.】

item.title: 债券市场在波动中自我反驳
item.description:
本周美国经济表现不俗。【原文：

This week brings tales of a US economy that’s doing pretty well.

】

item.title: Toscafund 聘用 Ryan Squillante 为北美地区主管
item.description: Toscafund 资产管理公司（Toscafund Asset Management）聘请了一位新的北美地区主管，这家以长线投资为主的投资者希望抓住 9 月份股票资本市场活动预期增加的机遇。【原文：Toscafund Asset Management has hired a new head of North America, as the predominantly long-only investor looks to capitalize on an expected rise in equity capital markets activity come September.】

item.title: 英国塞兹韦尔 C 核电厂投资决策有可能拖至 2025 年
item.description: 由于英国大选后与私人投资者的谈判时间比预期的要长，英国下一座大型核电站 Sizewell C 的最终投资决策有可能推迟到明年。【原文：A final investment decision in Britain’s next large-scale nuclear power plant, Sizewell C, risks getting pushed into next year as negotiations with private investors are taking longer than anticipated following the UK election.】

item.title: 德国要求 Uniper 为危机救助支付更多款项
item.description: 德国要求国有化能源公司 Uniper SE 在 2022 年偿还更多的救助资金，因为德国正试图填补预算漏洞。【原文：Germany is demanding higher repayments from nationalized energy company Uniper SE for a bailout in 2022, as the state tries to plug a hole in its budget.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋开工量意外跃升至 13 个月新高
item.description: 加拿大的住房开工率出人意料地升至一年多来的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s housing starts surprisingly rose to the highest level in more than a year.】
